item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】ALAC - Stray Kids – ROCK-STAR (Apple Music JP, Catalog ID – 1715406806) [WEB M4A ALAC 16-Bit/44.1 kHz + Apple Music Apple Lossless Audio]
item.description:
Description

記録破りのアルバム『5-STAR』から5か月、JYP Entertainmentが誇るK-Popシーンのスーパースター、Stray Kidsが、8人ならではのエネルギッシュなEP『ROCK-STAR』と共に帰ってくる。本EPには、日本のシンガー、LiSA とコラボレーションした曲「Social Path」の韓国語バージョンや、パワフルなリードシングル「LALALALA」の2つのバージョンを含む全8曲を収録。Stray Kidsのサブユニット、3RACHAのメンバーであるBang Chan、Changbin、HANの3人が楽曲の作曲を担当した。ここでは、メンバーが『ROCK-STAR』の収録曲について解説してくれる。

MEGAVERSE
Bang Chan：「MEGAVERSE」は、Stray Kidsの音楽の広大なスペクトルを表している曲。さまざまなタイプの音楽の世界に触れたStray Kidsは、今からリスナーを…SKZ MEGAVERSEに歓迎します。ぜひ楽しんで！

LALALALA
Seungmin：この曲は一つのコアなメッセージがテーマとなっています。それは、“どんなことになっても、僕らのロックは続く”ということ。ニューアルバムからのリードトラックで（韓国語のタイトルは「락 (樂)」で、“락”はロック、“樂”は喜びを意味するが発音は同じ）、ロックスターのような壮大なステージパフォーマンスも用意されています。曲と一緒に、必ずパフォーマンスもチェックしてね！

BLIND SPOT
HAN：夢に向かって人知れず努力する中で負った傷が、やがて素晴らしいトロフィになることを歌った曲。希望と勇気のメッセージです。聴く人を慰めて、元気づけることができるといいな！

COMFLEX
Felix：自分の嫌な部分をひっくり返して、自慢できるものに変えられることについて歌った曲。だから、タイトルは「COMPLEX」と「FLEX」を合わせた言葉なんです。この曲は僕たちの屈託のない陽気な一面をよく表しています。
_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Artist: Stray Kids (스트레이 키즈)
Album: 樂-STAR
Release: 2023/11/10
Type: Mini-Album
Format: Apple Lossless Audio Codec
Quality: High Fidelity, Lossless Audio - CD Quality
Sample Rate: 16-Bit/44.100 kHz - Stereo
Encoding: M4A (Apple MPEG-4 Audio)
Source: Ripped from Apple Music

TRACK LIST
1. MEGAVERSE
2. 락 (樂)
3. 사각지대
4. COMFLEX
5. 가려줘
6. Leave
7. Social Path (feat. LiSA) (Korean Ver.)
8. 락 (樂) (Rock Ver.)

MORE INFORMATION
1 Disc - 8 Tracks.
Artwork - JPEG 4000x4000.
SoX Spectrogram - Preview.
MediaInfo - Preview.

DOWNLOAD *Includes LRC files*

item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】ALAC - Stray Kids – ROCK-STAR (Apple Music US, Catalog ID – 1710644819) [WEB M4A ALAC 16-Bit/44.1 kHz + Apple Music Apple Lossless Audio]
item.description:
Description

Five months after the record-breaking 5-STAR, K-pop superstars Stray Kids return with ROCK-STAR, a characteristically energetic EP for JYP Entertainment’s eight-member group. ROCK-STAR features eight tracks, including “Social Path,” a Korean interpretation of the group’s previous collab with Japanese singer LiSA, and two versions of the thumping, punny lead single “LALALALA.” All of the songs on ROCK-STAR were written by at least one member of 3RACHA, Stray Kids’ hip-hop sub-unit comprising group members Bang Chan, Changbin, and HAN. Here the members talk about each of ROCK-STAR’s tracks.

“MEGAVERSE”
Bang Chan: “‘MEGAVERSE’ is a song that represents the vast spectrum of Stray Kids’ music. Having touched the universes of different kinds of music, Stray Kids now welcome listeners to…the SKZ MEGAVERSE. Enjoy!”

“LALALALA”
Seungmin: “This one’s all about one core message, which is: ‘Our rock will go on, no matter how tough things might get.’ It’s the title track from our new album [in Korean, titled ‘락 (樂),’ with 락 meaning ‘rock’ and 樂 meaning ‘joy’ but pronounced the same] with a huge, rock-star-worthy stage performance to go along with it. Be sure to check out our performance as well as the music.”

“BLIND SPOT”
HAN: “This song is about how all the scars we get while striving, unseen, to reach our dreams will end up becoming wonderful trophies. It’s a message of hope and courage. I hope it will both comfort and pump up whoever listens to it.”

“COMFLEX”
Felix: “It’s about how you can flip those things you don’t like about yourself, turning them instead into something you can flex about. So the title’s a portmanteau of ‘COMPLEX’ and ‘FLEX.’ This track really showcases our carefree, cheery side.”

“Cover Me”
Hyunjin: “The message in this one is: ‘That bright moonlight is making the night longer. So stay by my side and cover me from it.’ I like how the track builds up emotionally, with intensifying vocals toward the end. I hope this warm and passionate song will bring comfort to listeners.”

“Leave”
Changbin: “This is a heartbreaking song about lovers saying goodbye. Driven by a forlorn-feeling guitar riff motif, the song really captures the mood of autumn.”

“Social Path” (feat. LiSA) [Korean Ver.]
Lee Know: “This is a song that conveys hopefulness, and it’s about giving all of your youth, working hard to achieve your dreams. It brings together an intense rock sound with powerful vocals. I hope it will inspire listeners with the courage to forge their own paths.”

“LALALALA (Rock Ver.)”
I.N: “This is the rock version of our title track, ‘락 (樂)’ [titled ‘LALALALA’ in English], bringing it closer to the title. If rock’s what you're into, this is the version for you. We upped the energy here, and the track’s buzzing with a thrilling synergy.”
_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Artist: Stray Kids (스트레이 키즈)
Album: 樂-STAR
Release: 2023/11/10
Type: Mini-Album
Format: Apple Lossless Audio Codec
Quality: High Fidelity, Lossless Audio - CD Quality
Sample Rate: 16-Bit/44.100 kHz - Stereo
Encoding: M4A (Apple MPEG-4 Audio)

2. 락 (樂)
3. 사각지대
4. COMFLEX
5. 가려줘
